name: Finnish - Korean - Finnish
description:
This game was made for Finland x South Korea Jam (GNOJ #5) organized by Aalto University Games Now! lecture series.

Time: November 1st 2021 at 1:00 PM to November 7th 2021 at 3:00 PM (EET)
Theme: Create a game combining Finnish and South Korean.

This game combines experimental Finnish style game design with the South-Korean language.

Credits:
Flag arts created by Tiia Vastamäki
